thread.title: Apple hit with lawsuit over iOS 9s Wi-Fi Assist
thread.title_full: Apple hit with lawsuit over iOS 9s Wi-Fi Assist

title: Apple hit with lawsuit over iOS 9s Wi-Fi Assist
text:
Apple hit with lawsuit over iOS 9's Wi-Fi Assist 
Beta News Sunday 25th October, 2015 
Wi-Fi Assist feature found in iOS 9 has caught some people unawares, and many have complained that they have been landed with large bills due to increased data usage. Two individuals have filed a class action lawsuit in California against Apple, alleging that the company failed to properly explain how Wi-Fi Assist works. 
While...
